title: Merging Accounts (for icons and legacy/limited skins only)
body:
Would it ever be possible to get an account merge time period that would not result in ip or rp being switched over?
What I mean by this, is merge two accounts (removing one in the process). 
Reasons: 
- To obtain the legacy and limited skins from the dissolving account
- To obtain the icons from the dissolved account
- As a once off for people who still play but basically have obsolete accounts (due to spending for rp on one account for more than the other over the years).
- As stated this would avoid IP transfers, and RP transfers. Meaning concerns about ip farming (from the win of the day) would not be a problem.
- It will also remove some unused accounts.

replies.body: We encourage people to only use one account for almost this exact reason. We can't merge accounts for any reason at this time, regardless of whether or not the RP/IP would be transferred.
